alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:22PM MST until November 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to to 9 inches. Winds gusting 60-70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains above 10000 feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility over high mountain passes. Cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
